title.rendered: How To Remove Clothing Wrinkles in Photoshop

content.rendered:
Table Of Contents

    • 0.1 Why Remove Clothing Wrinkles From A Photo?
    • 0.2 How To Remove Clothing Wrinkles In Photoshop
  • 1 Alternative Ways to Remove Clothing Wrinkles
    • 1.1 Using Patch Tool
    • 1.2 Using Spot Healing Brush Tool.
    • 1.3 Using Healing Brush Tool
  • 2 Advance Way To Remove Clothing Wrinkles Using Frequency Separation
  • 3 Things To Remember When Removing Clothing Wrinkles
    • 3.1 Bordie Capron

Clothing wrinkles are the most annoying aspect of model photography. Your model looks fabulous, but their clothing appears full of wrinkles. Even you will face clothing wrinkles while featuring fabric products. The wrinkles look weird and make your viewer distracted. As a solution, you could learn how to remove clothing wrinkles in Photoshop.

Softwares like Photoshop from Adobe feel like magic. Using the mysterious power of built-in tools, you would vanish the clothing wrinkle into the black hole. It’s not that hard; you only need to try a bit. 

Why Remove Clothing Wrinkles From A Photo?

Are you doing model photography? Or Clothing products? The common blockage you will face is clothing wrinkles. But whether you would want it or not, wrinkles will appear on your model’s dress all the time. It’s a natural incident but breaks up the whole photoshoot. It would help if you fixed it up.

Even more, the clothing wrinkles distract the viewer from the main subject. 

If you have any kind of wrinkles on the dress of your model, you have to edit them with professional photo retouching.

It’s fairly easy to edit these wrinkles with professional software like Adobe Photoshop.

How To Remove Clothing Wrinkles In Photoshop

Removing clothing wrinkles is a must if you want a distraction-free image. Thus, with simple photoshop tools, you would remove clothing wrinkles faster than ever.

These are the steps to follow:

Step 1: Open up Adobe Photoshop on your device. If you don’t have the software at first, download it out.

Step 2: Go to File > Open, choose the image you want to edit. Or drag and drop the image file itself into Photoshop.

Step 3: Once you open the file, Zoom into the wrinkles you want to fix. 

Note: Press the “Z” key to start using the zoom tool.

Step 4: Click on the Clone stamp tool icon. Or you could press the key “S” to activate the tool. 

Step 5: At first, press “Alt” and click on any surrounding area of the wrinkle. It would let you sample that particular area. Now, fix the size of your brush. Press opening and closing the third bracket key to make the brush are bigger and smaller. 

Step 6: Once you are happy with the brush size, start brushing out the wrinkle with care. 

Note: Make sure you sample from other surrounding spots while brushing. It would help you to avoid any repetition. 

Step 7: Once you are done, apply the same process for other wrinkles as well.

So, these are the steps you should consider removing any wrinkles. According to most veteran Photoshop experts, the clamp tool is the best tool to remove wrinkles. That’s why you must try it before using any other tools and techniques.

Alternative Ways to Remove Clothing Wrinkles

As I have mentioned, the Clone tool of Adobe Photoshop is the best way to deal with wrinkles. But you have other options as well. If you don’t feel comfortable with the clone tool, check out these tools to fix your wrinkles. 

Let’s try out these tools one by one:

Using Patch Tool

Patch tool is a simple yet efficient tool to in Adobe Photoshop remove clothing wrinkles. 

Step 1: Open your Image, File > Open.

Step 2: Click on the Patch tool icon from the left toolbar. 

Note: If you don’t get the patch tool icon, right-click on the spot healing brush tool icon. Then select the Patch tool from the drop-down.

Step 3: Zoom into the clothing wrinkle and draw a circle covering the boundary of the wrinkle. 

Step 4: Then click and drag the selected area to a plain surface of the clothing. 

Step 5: To eliminate the outer binding fabric of  your model use liquifies features. First, go to the Filter menu > Liquify. 

Step 6: Then another window will open up. Click on the Freeze Mask Tool or press F. Brush up the edge of the clothing. After that click on the Forward Warp Tool. Brush the outer binding fabric towards the fabric lining. That’s it.

Step 7: Done, your clothing wrinkle and bendings have vanished.

 

Using Spot Healing Brush Tool.

It’s an amazing and simple tool to remove wrinkles with minimum affordance. When you are in a hurry and need a quick fix, the following tool can get you out of trouble.

Step 1: Open your image in Adobe Photoshop.

Step 2: Click on the Spot Healing Brush Tool icon. Now adjust the brush size by pressing the third bracket(opening and closing) keys.

Step 3: Once you are happy with the brush size, zoom into the wrinkle.  Brush over the wrinkle. Make sure you start from the edge of the wrinkle. The tool would determine the correct texture according to the surroundings.

Note: Don’t overdo the brushing; otherwise, it might discolor the brushing region.

Using Healing Brush Tool

If you are not satisfied with the automatic pixel sampling, use the healing brush tool. It lets you sample a particular spot to brush up on the clothing wrinkle.

Step 1: Open your image in Photoshop.

Step 2: Click on the healing brush tool. Can’t find the icon? Right-click on the Spot healing brush tool icon and select the healing brush tool from the drop-down.

Step 3: Now press Alt + Left click at once to sample any area around the wrinkle. Once you have got the sample start brushing over the wrinkle.

Note: With the Healing Brush Tool selected, you would get several customization options. At the upper panel, you will get options to change the brush’s size, flow, mood, and spacings. So, use them when appropriate.

 

Advance Way To Remove Clothing Wrinkles Using Frequency Separation

You could try out an advanced way to remove clothing wrinkles. It’s called frequency separation. Therefore, the technique is for pro users. Yet must try it out if you are not getting pleasing results with default Photoshop tools.

Step 1: Open your Image.

Step 2: Unlock the current image layer by clicking on the lock icon while pressing the alt key.

Step 3: Press Ctrl + “J” key twice to duplicate the current image into 3 total layers.

Step 4: Select the middle image layer. Then go to filter > Blur > Gaussian Blur. Choose the blurriness where the wrinkle is not showing clearly. And Press Ok.

Step 5: Select the top image layer. Go to image> Apply image. 

Step 6: Now, on the Layer section, choose the middle layer. Choose the blend mode to “Subtract.” Set scale to 2 and offset to 128. Click Ok.

Step 7: Afterward, click on the top layer and change the layer mode to Linear Light.

Step 8: Finally, click on the “Mixer Brush Tool” and start bruising out the wrinkles. That’s it.

Note: The following technique would not work on all sorts of images.

 

Things To Remember When Removing Clothing Wrinkles

Sometimes things get messy while removing clothing wrinkles. It’s better to have some concern while removing clothing wrinkles. 

Save the Modification

Once you remove the clothing wrinkle, it’s time to save down the changes. You only have to press the Ctrl + S key to save the changes you made. At any cost, don’t close down the Adobe Photoshop software without saving it out. Otherwise, your modification won’t affect your image at all.

Avoid Creating Pattern

It’s a common phenomenon while you try to remove clothing linings. You try to remove the wrinkle, but instead, you create an unwanted repeating pattern. To avoid it, try to sample from the different areas while brushing.

Use Different Tools If Needed

With different tools, you get various effects. So, if you are not getting a perfect output through a specific tool, use others as well. Or try out the frequency division technique as the last option.

Don’t Go Overboard

MDG advertising statistics show, 67% of customers consider image quality while they purchase any product. So, take your image quality seriously. While you use brushing tools like spot healing, please don’t overdo it. 

With excess brushing, your wrinkle spot would get burned out. So, while brushing a specific region, try to customize the brush size, spacing, opacity to get a better result.

Last lines

Removing clothing wrinkles in Photoshop offers you a pleasing model image. Your model would look fresh and in focus. With a few tries, you get to learn how to remove clothing wrinkles in Photoshop. It’s an easy and straightforward process. So, Don’t hold back.

However, it would be best if you always tried to iron clothes beforehand. 

Even if you try 100%, your model would have some clothing wrinkles. This is why my comprehensive guide would help you out.

Still, feeling uncertain about your skill? Reach out to professional or photo editing services.

Bordie Capron

Author

“Bordie Capron is a Sr. Content Maker who is working in The Clipping Path Service an US-based image and video post-production company for over 7+ years. She completed her degree in graphic designing and worked as a graphic designing expert for several years. She always loved writing”
